Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity.scope This package contains validation model implementation classes for scope related validation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.visitors Classes implementing the Visitor pattern used to perform various functions on the activity definitions.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.  
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy
          Base impl of the fault matching strategy.
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultMatchingRule
          Base class for matching rules.
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndData
          Matches a fault w/ data to a catch with a matching fault name and data
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnly
          Matches a fault with data to a catch w/o a name but with matching data
IAeCatch
          Provides interface for faultHandlers.
IAeFaultMatchingRule
          interface for the fault matching rules
IAeFaultMatchingStrategy
          Determines which fault handler is capable of catching a fault.
IAeMatch
          interface for the fault matching rules
